title: The One Where Lala Talks About The #PumpRules Reunion
description:
The Vanderpump Rules Reunion aired last week, and of course, Lala has some thoughts to share! She gets real about doing it virtually, where she stands with Brock, when she knew about James and Raquel, and what she thinks may be in store next season! Plus, Lala answers your voicemails about self-care, post break-up recovery, ride or die friendship, and what you can expect if you come to see the “Give Them Lala Tour” live! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
